blogPost.excerpt: Sleegal is an online marketplace that uses machine learning to match users with lawyers. We built this website free for all to use because we believe high-quality professional service should be made accessible to everyone, not just the elite.
blogPost.body: Sleegal is an online marketplace that uses machine learning to match users with lawyers. We built this website free for all to use because we believe high-quality professional service should be made accessible to everyone, not just the elite.
blogPost.title: Sleegal - Find the right lawyers instantly - free for all to use
blogPost.author: Gloria Qiao

localize.description: Sleegal是一个在线市场，它使用机器学习来匹配用户和律师。我们建立这个网站供所有人免费使用，因为我们认为高质量的专业服务应该让每个人都能获得，而不仅仅是精英阶层。
localize.tagline: 立即找到合适的律师--所有人都可以免费使用。

localize.description: Sleegal是一個在線市場，它使用機器學習來匹配用戶和律師。我們建立這個網站供所有人免費使用，因爲我們認爲高質量的專業服務應該讓每個人都能獲得，而不僅僅是精英階層。
localize.tagline: 立即找到合適的律師--所有人都可以免費使用。
